sentences.sentence: Green Camp is looked upon as the oriflamme of the environment protection of Chinese undergraduate.
sentences.translation: “绿色营”被看作中国大学生环保活动的旗帜。

sentences.sentence: Du Bois held oriflamme of pan-Africanism high and devoted himself to African Negroes liberation, so that he was the thesaurus of pan-Africanism in a long time.
sentences.translation: 杜波依斯高举泛非主义的旗帜，为非洲黑人的解放而不懈努力，以至于在很长一段时间内杜波依斯成了“泛非主义”的同义词。
